articles.author: Lewis Barton
articles.title: We simulated Arsenal vs Porto to predict the Gunners' Champions League fate - Football.London
articles.description: Arsenal welcome Porto to the Emirates Stadium on Tuesday night, so we simulated the Champions League clash to see who could advance to the next round
articles.content:
After falling to defeat in the first leg, Arsenal must beat Porto by two goals on Tuesday night if the Gunners want to advance to the Champions League quarter-finals. 
Unlike the Arsenal we've seen … [+3439 chars]
